meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mary Manhardt Eric Brach Sarah Olson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6746.

td.p: Mary Manhardt, a documentary film editor from New York, New York
Eric Brach, a teacher and author from Culver City, California
Sarah Olson, a project coordinator from El Cerrito, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $27,401)

tr.td: "U". "S". CITIES
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "U" or the letter "S".)
GREEN THINGS
TV ANCHORS AWEIGH!
MEYER TO NAUVOO
(Alex: Each correct response will relate to something you can find In the Encyclopedia Americana between Meyer and Nauvoo.)
BODY PART PREFIXES
(Kelly: From L.A.'s Science Center, clues about its adventures as it went around the world nearly 5,000 times.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Eric, let\'s take--you\'re smiling, and why are you smiling? Because you paid a tribute to Elizabeth Brach, who is your...)
(Eric: Grandmother.)
(Alex: Your grandmother. Okay. You\'re gonna lose money because of Granny.)
SarahWho is Fanny Brice? Carol Channing?
$5,400
EricWho is Elizabeth Brach?
$100
MaryWho is Carol Chann
$4,399
Carol Channing')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
